taskDescription: The relative energy levels of the five π molecular orbitals of the cyclopentadienyl system are similar to those in benzene. That is, there is a single lowest-energy MO, above which the orbitals come in degenerate pairs. Draw a diagram like that in Figure 15.6, and tell which of the five orbitals are occupied in the cation, radical, and anion.
